mapper.insert: insert into member_board (free_board_num, board_code, subject, content, nickname,insert_date) values ( #{free_board_num},'r', #{subject}, #{content}, #{nickname}, #{insert_date} )
mapper.select: select * from free_board order by free_board_num desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
mapper.update: update free_board set readcount=readcount+1 where free_board_num=#{free_board_num}
update free_board set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} where free_board_num=#{free_board_num}
